com.bigdata.btree

Class PageStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.btree.BaseIndexStats
      • com.bigdata.btree.PageStats
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTreePageStats, HTreePageStats

    public abstract class PageStats
extends BaseIndexStats
    Class reports various summary statistics for nodes and leaves.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long blobs
      The #of allocations that are larger than the maximum slot size in SLOT_SIZES.
      long[] histogram
      Histogram of the allocation slot sizes based on SLOT_SIZES.
      long leafBytes
      The #of bytes in the raw records for the leaves visited.
      long maxLeafBytes
      The min/max bytes per leaf.
      long maxNodeBytes
      The min/max bytes per node.

      The min/max bytes per leaf.

      The min/max bytes per node.
      long nerrors
      The #of errors encountered during traversal.
      long nodeBytes
      The #of bytes in the raw records for the nodes visited.
      long nrawRecs
      The number of raw record allocations and the byte size of those raw record allocations.
      long nvisited
      Number of nodes/leaves visited so far.
      long rawRecBytes
      The number of raw record allocations and the byte size of those raw record allocations.
      static int[] SLOT_SIZES
      This map is used to report the histogram of pages based on the actual byte count of the user data in the allocation when the backing slot size is not directly available.

      abstract int getRecommendedBranchingFactor()
      This computes the recommended branching factor for the index based on an examination of the current branching factor, an assumed nominal page size of 8k, the min, max, and average node and leaf sizes, and the histogram of the allocation sizes for the index.

        The min/max bytes per leaf.

      • maxLeafBytes

        public long maxLeafBytes
        The min/max bytes per leaf.

      • histogram

        public final long[] histogram
        Histogram of the allocation slot sizes based on SLOT_SIZES. The indices into this array are correlated with the indices into the SLOT_SIZES array. If the allocation is larger than the maximum value in SLOT_SIZES, then it is recorded in blobs instead.

      • blobs

        public long blobs
        The #of allocations that are larger than the maximum slot size in SLOT_SIZES.

      • nerrors

        public long nerrors
        The #of errors encountered during traversal.

      • SLOT_SIZES

        public static final int[] SLOT_SIZES
        This map is used to report the histogram of pages based on the actual byte count of the user data in the allocation when the backing slot size is not directly available. Allocations

      • nrawRecs

        public long nrawRecs
        The number of raw record allocations and the byte size of those raw record allocations. TODO We could also use a histogram over this information (raw records sizes).

      • rawRecBytes

        public long rawRecBytes
        The number of raw record allocations and the byte size of those raw record allocations. TODO We could also use a histogram over this information (raw records sizes).

      • getRecommendedBranchingFactor

        public abstract int getRecommendedBranchingFactor()
        This computes the recommended branching factor for the index based on an examination of the current branching factor, an assumed nominal page size of 8k, the min, max, and average node and leaf sizes, and the histogram of the allocation sizes for the index.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Optimize RWStore allocator sizes TODO This says "branching factor", but {@link #m} is overloaded and is the branching factor for the BTree and the addressBits for the HTree. This method should be renamed (or moved into the concrete instances of this class).

      • visit

        public void visit(ISimpleTreeIndexAccess ndx,
                  IAbstractNodeData node)
        Visit a node or leaf, updating the PageStats.

        Note: This method MUST be extended to capture at least the initialization of the BaseIndexStats.ntuples, BaseIndexStats.nnodes, BaseIndexStats.nleaves, and BaseIndexStats.m fields.

        Parameters:
        ndx - The index.
        node - A node or leaf in that index.
